ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He Who created you and formed you and proportioned you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who created you then formed your symmetry, then gave you right proportion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Who created you, shaped you, and made you well-proportioned,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Who created you proportionately and fashioned you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The One Who created you, then moulded you, then made you proper?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who created you, fashioned you perfectly, and gave you due proportion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who created you, then made you complete, then made you symmetrical?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who created thee and shaped thee and wrought thee in symmetry
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who created thee, then fashioned, then proportioned thee?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who created you, fashioned you and proportioned you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who created thee, then moulded thee, then proportioned thee?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who created you and proportioned you, and gave you an upright nature,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Him Who created thee. Fashioned thee in due proportion, and gave thee a just bias;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who created you, fashioned you perfectly, and gave you due proportion;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who created you, formed you and proportioned you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He Who created you, and formed you, and proportioned you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [82:7] Who created you, when you were not, then made you upright, in your created form, with sound limbs, then proportioned you (read fa-‘adalak or fa-‘addalak), making you symmetrical in shape, with well-proportioned parts, so that no hand or leg is longer than the other,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who created thee) a living being from a sperm drop, (then fashioned) in the womb of your mother, (then proportioned thee) then made your stature erect?
